string.value: You're really starting to look like a Bowman. #b#p1012100##k wants to help you with one last training session.
#p1012100# wants you to slay #r15 #o1210101#s#k as a test. #o1210101#s are much stronger than #o0210100#s. Stay alert. \n\n#o1210101# #r#a21391##k
You destroyed 15 #o1210101#s. Wasn't easy, but you feel like you're well on your way to becoming an amazing Bowman.
지금까지 수련을 잘 따라와 주어서 고마워요. 진정한 한명의 궁수가 된 당신의 모습을 정말 기쁘군요. 하지만 정말 당신이 궁수가 되었음을 증명하기 위해선, 한 가지 시험에 통과해야만해요.
시험은 간단해요. 리본돼지 15마리 사냥. 리본돼지는 지금껏 당신이 상대해왔던 몬스터보다 훨씬 강한 녀석이니 사냥 중에 절대 긴장을 풀어서는 안 될 거예요. 하지만 그렇다고 해서 너무 걱정하진 말아요. 당신은 이미 리본돼지와 싸울 수 있을 정도로 강해져 있으니까요.
시험이 두려운 건가요? 두려워하지 말아요. 자네는 이미 한 명의 궁수입니다.
Thank you for listening to me. I'm really happy to see a real skilled Bowman. You need to have a test to prove you're a real Bowman.
The test is simple. Hunting #rfifteen #o1210101##k. #o1210101# is the strongest monster that you ever competed. Be alert and no worries. You're strong enough to fight with #o1210101#.
Are you afraid of a test? Don't be. You are already an Bowman.
You really made fifteen #o1210101#. I know you could make it. Wonderful. You improved a lot in quite short time.
It is just beginning as an Bowman. You have a long way to go. It's tough but face your enemy. Be brave enough to draw a bow. That's what archers are meant to be.
You haven't hunted#rfifteen#o1210101##k. Don't make haste. Please be calm as a Bowman.
